content:
Please generate a random model card for a spaceship. Attributes to populate:

Name: The name of the spaceship.
Class: The category/type of spaceship.
Size: The dimensions or capacity of the spaceship.
Engine Type: The propulsion system of the spaceship.
Armament: The weapons equipped on the spaceship.
Crew Capacity: The maximum number of crew members the spaceship can accommodate.

Name: Stellar Voyager

Class: Exploration Cruiser

Size: 350 meters in length, 150 meters in width, 80 meters in height

Engine Type: Quantum Fusion Drive

Armament: Dual Phased Plasma Cannons, Point Defense Laser Turrets (x8), Missile Pods (x4)

Crew Capacity: 120 (including Officers, Scientists, Engineers, and Support Staff)
